name: BIO SONAR
description:
The game takes place in a dark cave. in order to solve the obstacles, the player must use his own vocals.

///

Designers: Eyal Avraham, Talia Hamburg

 Developers: Artume Pichersky, Yakir Bukris

Guidance: Eran Hilleli, Lior Bruder

Game Jam class, Bezalel 2021

///

Keyboard: Arrow Keys + microphone

For optimal experience, a quiet environment is recommended.
